welcome_message_body: "Welcome to East Milton, a charming city known for its scenic beauty and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and embrace all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pensacola International Airport houses both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pensacola NAS Airport serves all commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Pensacola NAS Airport serves all military flights and personnel.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bob Sikes Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Bob Sikes Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is used exclusively for military flights and personnel.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
